thread.title: JASON

author: JASON
title: JASON
text: I bought a dyson v8 or v6 can't remember it was a birthday present for someone ( it's what they wanted ğŸ™„) but I found the staff to be brilliant. The sales rep I dealt with in Sundrive road store was excellent. Slim guy with bleached blonde hair. He explained what the product did, and to be fair I was only browsing he convinced me it was the right thing to buy.
